rrhvella.coursework1

Class Chord

  • java.lang.Object
    • rrhvella.coursework1.Chord

  • public class Chord
extends java.lang.Object
    The harmonic information occupying a span of time.

    • Field Summary

      The interval pattern of the chord.
      private byte tonic
      The MIDI note equivalent to the chord's tonic.

    • Method Detail

      • getMidiNote

        public byte getMidiNote(int chordDegree,
               int octave)
        Returns the MIDI note at the given chord degree and octave.
        Parameters:
        chordDegree - the degree of the new note in this chord. If chordDegree = 2, this would mean the third note in the chord, 0 would mean the first.
        octave - the octave of the chord.
        Returns:
        the MIDI note at the given chord degree and octave.

      • getChordPattern

        public int[] getChordPattern()
        Return the interval pattern for this chord.
        Returns:
        the interval pattern for this chord.
        See Also:
        ChordType
